Lectures vpon the Epistle of Paul to the Colossians. Preached by that faithfull seruant of God, Maister Robert Rollok, sometime rector of the Vniuersitie of Edenburgh Rollock, Robert, 1555?-1599. Holland, Henry, 1555 or 6-1603.
[16], 442, [2] p.
Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, dwelling in Pater-noster row, ouer against the signe of the Checker, At London : 1603.
Editor's foreword signed: Henry Holland. The first leaf and the last leaf are blank. Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
=======

[16], 442, [2] p.
Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, dwelling in Pater-noster row, ouer against the signe of the Checker, At London : 1603.
Editor's foreword signed: Henry Holland. The first leaf and the last leaf are blank. Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
Felix Kyngston
Pater-noster row, ouer against the signe of the Checker
